title: Jan Shikshan Sansthan Jodhpur
detailsOfAchievement: Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS), Jodhpur (erstwhile Shramik Vidyapeeth) is an NGO sanctioned and cent percent funded by the Government of India, Ministry of Human Resource Development (Department of School Education & Literacy), New Delhi. It is a registered society under the Rajasthan Societiesâ€™ Act of 1958. The JSS was established in the year 1985 under the aegis of Jodhpur Adult Education Association, a pioneer volunteer agency working in the field of adult education, non-formal education and women empowerment. During the past 25 years of its existence, the JSS has imparted vocational training in different trades to non-literates, semi-literates, economically deprived sections of the society and other persons with a little education. Every year our annual action plan is submitted to the Directorate of Adult Education, Government of India, New Delhi and as per their approval we conduct the courses. Our courses include cutting & tailoring, dress making, embroidery, Rajasthani dress making, basic computer courses, nursing assistant course, medical lab technician assistant course, house wiring and electrical training, plumbing, welding and fabrication, refrigeration and air conditioning, washing machine repair, rexene and canvas bag making, soft toys making etc. As per the revised policy of the Government of India, the area of operation of JSS has been spread over the entire district of Jodhpur instead of the city area as was earlier. The new motto of â€œSakshar Bharatâ€ is being launched in the entire country by the Ministry of HRD with the active participation of JSSs in rural areas to make literate about seven crore non-litertes.

detailsOfAchievement: Major activities / achievement 1- Major Activities To organize skill development and skill up gradations prgromme for the clientele, i.e. women beneficiaries to organize different awareness activities on state and national issues such as environment, population, Education, Savings, Women empowerment, AIDS awareness programme health hygiene, nutrition. 2- MANDATE â€“ Skill development prgoramme & life enrichment education of those who are in the age group of 15-35 years having no or rudimentary levels of education. 3- PRIORTIES- Women, SCs/STs/ OBSCs other economically weaker section minorities. Rural areas and urban slums. 4- Clientele - persons specially women is the age group of 15-35 year and beyond having no & rudimentary revel of education, more so belonging to SC/ST/OBC and minorities in the rural & urban slum. 5- TRAINING to organize training programme for new resource person to organize training progrme for resource persons & Key person under Sakshar Bharat Abhiyan launched by N.L.M. 6- Skill development activity on Lokshiksha Kendra under Sakshar Bhart Abhiyan. ( Proposed ) The overall objective of J.S.S. is providing quality training & ensure that our beneficiaries get gainful employment, wage employment & self employment. The whole affairs of J.S.S. governed by Board of Management which is sanctioned by G.O.I., M.H.R.D. New Delhi under the guidence of Directorate of Adult Education, New Delhi. Achievement - J.S.S. Kota have been working since 1982( before 2000 it was SVP) J.S.S. Kota is one of the pioneer institution of the country who developed its own Big Building through mobilizing local resource. - 95% beneficiaries belonging to women. - J.S.S. having good report with district administration. - All programmes are offered free of cost to the weaker section. - Kota got highest literacy rate 74.45as per 2001 censes J.S.S. Kota played significant role in achieving this traget. - J.S.S. Kota having tie up with DSCL & CFCL & other local industries also. - J.S.S. Kota is a nodal training agency for different govt. sponsored training scheme like Z.S.S. S.J.S.R.Y, RMOLE, SJRY, Narega etc.
